entries.meaning: (Britain, informal, dated) Two pence (in pre- or post-decimalisation currency).
examples: Milk has gone up to tuppence ha’penny a pint.

entries.meaning: (Britain, idiomatic) Short for tuppence worth (“one’s opinion”).
(Britain, slang, euphemistic, usually childish) The vulva or vagina.
examples: "Fucksticks!" When some smart-arse bastard gives me my comeuppance / "Fucksticks!" When it’s ages since I’ve seen a lady’s tuppence
